util/ ThinArray.js

The ThinArray is a special type of object that can be used to pass a query back and forth from a server in a simple format.  The format looks like the following:

|3|COL1|COL2|COL3|data1|data2|data3
\_/\____________/\_______________...
 header  |              |
        columns        data ...

which is easy to produce and read

Copyright

2004 Rob Rohan and Dick Applebaum (robr.nosp@m.ohan@gmai.nosp@m.l.com) All rights reserved

Variables

THINARRAY_VERSION

var THINARRAY_VERSION

the library version

TARecord

A thin array record.  These are normally gotten with a ThinArray.getRecord(num) call and they are not attached to the thin array after creation. i.e. changes to a TARecord object do not reflect in the original ThinArray.

Parameters

cols vals

TARecord.get

gets the value of a column in this row

Parameters

ithe column int position or string name

Returns

the value of that cell

Parameters

ithe column int position or string name
valuethe new value to set

Functions

ThinArray. fromPacket

<pre> makes the thin array from a packet

3|COL1|COL2|COL3|data1|data2|data3

\_/\____________/\_______________... header | | columns data ...  </pre> @param str the packet

ThinArray. toPacket

Makes this ThinArray a string ready to be transfered

Returns

this thinarray as a packet

ThinArray. getRecordAsArray

gets a record from this thin array updateds to the record do not effect the original

Parameters

ithe index of the record to get

Returns

A record as an array

ThinArray. getCellValue

gets the value of a cell by row and column index.  The indexes are 1 based

Parameters

rthe row (record) index of the cell’s value you’re after
cthe column index of the cell’s value you’re after

ThinArray. getRecordCount

gets the number of records in this thinarray

Returns the number of records (rows) in this TA

ThinArray. setCellValue

Sets the value of a cell.  Changes the original

Parameters

rthe row to change
cthe column to change
valuethe new value

ThinArray. getRecord

Breaks off part of the thin array as a record object. updates to the record do not effect this object

Parameters

ithe record to get

Returns

a new TARecord object

ThinArray. __getAbsPosition

not an API callget the abs position in the flat array

Parameters

rrow
ccolumn

Returns

int the abs position

ThinArray. __copy

This should be part of some base object...  not and API call of TA Parameters: obj

Returns

a copy of whatever was passed in

ThinArray. toString

this thinarray as a printable string

Returns

this thinarray as a string
